metadata.description: Multi-tenant safe defaults for agency-client partnerships

controls: Logical data separation between client and agency
Role-based access control with partner-specific permissions
Audit trails showing which partner accessed what data
Data residency compliance per client requirements
Client retains ownership of generated content
No cross-pollination of client IP to competitors
Clear licensing terms for AI-generated assets

risks.description: Client data may inadvertently leak to other clients via shared AI context
risks.mitigation: Implement strict context isolation; clear AI memory between client sessions; audit all cross-client data flows

risks.description: AI may generate content similar to competitor's IP
risks.mitigation: Implement plagiarism detection; maintain training data provenance; obtain client approval before use

risks.description: Unclear responsibility when AI produces non-compliant content
risks.mitigation: Define clear SLAs; dual approval for high-stakes outputs; shared audit access

pre_execution.description: Verify both client and agency have approved AI usage for this purpose
Ensure client data is isolated from other tenants
Check for policy conflicts between client and agency policies

post_execution.description: Route outputs requiring approval to both client and agency stakeholders
Log all actions visible to both client and agency audit trails

monitoring.description: Monitor for unauthorized cross-tenant access attempts
Detect when client and agency policies diverge in incompatible ways
